frontmatter.title: Caroline Sinders (Convocation Design)
frontmatter.subtitle: Presented by the Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure at UMass Amherst
frontmatter.author: Initiative for Digital Public Infrastructure
frontmatter.excerpt: How could social media systems be designed as safe places that really work for the people who use them? What can art help us understand about machine learning data sets? Caroline Sinders of Convocation Design joins us this week to talk about her research-based art practice that's trying to change perspectives about what exactly is going wrong on the Internet, and just how exciting it may be to fix it.
